attributes.name: Beginner 2 (Alpha) - Saturday 10:15am
attributes.description:
NOTE: Please read the description for your registered class time.
Class Time: 10:15am - 10:45am
Practice/Free time: 10:45 - 11:15am

Beginner 1/Pre-Alpha beginning level skating class for ages 6-17

Class curriculum:

  1. Two-foot glide
  2. One-foot glide/ right foot/ left foot
  3. Forward Swizzle
  4. Backward Wiggle
  5. Backward Swizzle
  6. Forward Pumps

Beginner 2/Alpha Second beginning level skating class for ages 6-17

Class curriculum:

  1. Forward Stroking
  2. Forward Crossovers left over right.
  3. Forward Crossovers right over left
  4. One foot snowplow stops.
  5. Two-foot turn

Beginner 3/Beta Third beginning level skating class for ages 6-17

Class Curriculum:

  1. Backward Crossovers right over left
  2. Backward Crossovers left over right.
  3. Backward Stroking
  4. Right T-Stop

There are no refunds, make ups or credits for missed classes.
